dict.acceptation: 南方；南部；美国南方各州；（南半球的）发展中国家；
南的；（风）来自南方的；南风的；南方吹来的；

sent.orig: They reiterate that South-South cooperation enjoys important comparative advantages and complements rather than replaces North-South cooperation.
sent.trans: 我们重申，南南合作具有重要的比较优势，是南北合作的补充而不是替代。

sent.orig: North-South dialogue should be enhanced on the basis of equality and South-South cooperation conducted extensively.
sent.trans: 应在平等的基础上推进南北对话，同时应广泛开展南南合作。

sent.orig: In this connection, there is another side to South-South cooperation: it can promote North-South cooperation.
sent.trans: 所以，南南合作还有一个意义，可以推动南北合作。

sent.orig: China has consistently supported developing countries in their efforts to strengthen South-South cooperation and promote-South dialogue.
sent.trans: 中国一贯支持发展中国家之间开展的南南合作，支持发展中国家为推进南北对话而作出的努力。

sent.orig: There are National Highway G107-south-speed-south-Shijiazhuang, the provincial Rao there are roads south acrossEast-West Highway.
sent.trans: 公路有国道G107、京石高速纵贯南北，省道有正饶公路、正南公路横穿东西。
